00037         private SimulinkEcoreCreator simulinkEcoreCreator;

00039         @Test
00040         public void testSimulinkEcoreCreator() {
00041                 modelManager = new SimulinkModelManager("test.simulink");
00042                 SimulinkFactory factory = modelManager.getFactory();
00043                 simulinkEcoreCreator = new SimulinkEcoreCreator( factory );
00044                 assertNotNull(simulinkEcoreCreator);
00045         }
00046 
00047         @Test
00048         @Given("#testSimulinkEcoreCreator")
00049         public Model testNewModel() {
00050                 Model aModel = simulinkEcoreCreator.newModel("Pepito");
00051                 assertSame(aModel, simulinkEcoreCreator.getTopElement() );
00052                 return aModel;
00053         }

00055         @Test
00056         @Given("#testNewModel")
00057         public System testRootSystem(Model aModel) {
00058                 System rootSystem = simulinkEcoreCreator.addRootSystem("TheRootSystem");
00059                 assertSame(rootSystem, aModel.getRoot());
00060                 return rootSystem;
00061         }

00063         @Test
00064         @Given("#testRootSystem(Simulink.Model)")
00065         public System testFindSystem(System rootSystem) {
00066                 System aSystem = simulinkEcoreCreator.findSystem(rootSystem.getName());
00067                 assertSame(rootSystem, aSystem);
00068                 return rootSystem;
00069         }

00071         @Test
00072         @Given("#testFindSystem(Simulink.System)")
00073         public System testChild(System rootSystem) {
00074                 System aSystem = simulinkEcoreCreator.addSystem("F1",rootSystem);
00075                 assert(rootSystem.getChildren().size() == 1);
00076                 assertSame(aSystem, rootSystem.getChildren().get(0).getTarget());
00077                 return aSystem;
00078         }
00079 
00080         @Test
00081         @Given("#testChild(Simulink.System)")
00082         public System testReferences(System aSystem) {
00083                 System child = simulinkEcoreCreator.addSystem("F11", aSystem);
00084                 SystemReference reference = aSystem.getChildren().get(0);
00085                 assertSame(child, simulinkEcoreCreator.findSystem("F11"));
00086                 assertSame(child, reference.getTarget());
00087                 return aSystem;
00088         }
00089 
00090         @Test
00091         @Given("#testReferences(Simulink.System)")
00092         public System testSystemContainment(System aSystem) {
00093                 Model model  = simulinkEcoreCreator.getTopElement();
00094                 Integer definedSystems = model.getParts().size();
00095                 System root = model.getRoot();
00096                 simulinkEcoreCreator.addSystem("F11", root);
00097                 assertTrue(definedSystems == model.getParts().size() );
00098                 return aSystem;
00099         }
00100         
00101         @Test
00102         @Given("#testSystemContainment(Simulink.System)")
00103         public System testPorts(System aSystem) {
00104                 Inport inport1 = simulinkEcoreCreator.addInPort("P1In", aSystem);
00105                 Inport inport2 = simulinkEcoreCreator.addInPort("P2In", aSystem);
00106                 Outport outport1 = simulinkEcoreCreator.addOutPort("P1Out", aSystem);
00107                 assertNotNull(inport1);
00108                 assertNotNull(outport1);
00109                 assert(aSystem.getInports().size() == 2);
00110                 assert(aSystem.getOutports().size() == 1);
00111                 assertTrue("P1In".equalsIgnoreCase(aSystem.getInports().get(0).getName()));
00112                 assertSame(inport2.getParent(), aSystem);
00113                 return aSystem;
00114         }
00115 
00116         @Test
00117         @Given("#testPorts(Simulink.System)")
00118         public System testLines(System parent) {
00119                 System sysA = simulinkEcoreCreator.addSystem("SysA", parent);
00120                 System sysB = simulinkEcoreCreator.addSystem("SysB", parent);
00121                 Outport src = simulinkEcoreCreator.addOutPort("A1", sysA);
00122                 Inport dst = simulinkEcoreCreator.addInPort("B1", sysB);
00123 
00124                 Line lineA1B1 = simulinkEcoreCreator.addLine("A1B1",src,dst,parent);
00125                 assertNotNull( lineA1B1 );
00126                 assertTrue( parent.getLines().size() == 1);
00127                 assertSame(lineA1B1, parent.getLines().get(0));
00128                 return parent;
00129         }

00131         @Test
00132         @Given("#testLines(Simulink.System)")
00133         public System testFindPorts(System parent) {
00134                 Outport out = SimulinkEcoreCreator.findOutportWithin("A1", parent);
00135                 assertNotNull(out);
00136                 assertTrue(out.getName().equalsIgnoreCase("A1"));
00137                 Port p = SimulinkEcoreCreator.findPortWithin("A1", parent);
00138                 assertEquals(p, out);
00139                 p = SimulinkEcoreCreator.findOutportWithin("xxx", parent);
00140                 assertNull( p );
00141                 Inport in = SimulinkEcoreCreator.findInportWithin("B1", parent);
00142                 assertNotNull(in);
00143                 assertTrue(in.getName().equalsIgnoreCase("B1"));
00144                 in = SimulinkEcoreCreator.findInportWithin("xxx", parent);
00145                 assertNull(in);
00146                 return parent;
00147         }
00148         
00149         @Test
00150         @Given("#testFindPorts(Simulink.System)") 
00151         public System testAddLines(System parent) {
00152                 // Create two new ports
00153                 System sysA = simulinkEcoreCreator.findSystem("SysA");
00154                 System sysB = simulinkEcoreCreator.findSystem("SysB");
00155                 Outport a2      = simulinkEcoreCreator.addOutPort("A2", sysA);
00156                 Inport b2       = simulinkEcoreCreator.addInPort("B2", sysB);
00157                 Inport p2   = simulinkEcoreCreator.addInPort("P2", parent);
00158                 // Create two lines in between them
00159                 LineInfo line1 = new LineInfo( parent );
00160                 line1.setName("A2B2");
00161                 line1.setSrcPort( a2.getUuid() );
00162                 line1.setDstPort( b2.getUuid() );
00163                 LineInfo line2 = new LineInfo( parent );
00164                 line2.setName("P2B2");
00165                 line2.setSrcPort( p2.getUuid() );
00166                 line2.setDstPort( b2.getUuid() );
00167                 ArrayList<LineInfo> list = LineInfo.createArray();
00168                 list.add(line1);
00169                 list.add(line2);
00170                 try {
00171                         simulinkEcoreCreator.addLines( list );
00172                 } catch (PortNotFoundException e) { fail(); }
00173                 Boolean foundA2B2 = false;
00174                 Boolean foundP2B2 = false;
00175                 for (Line line : parent.getLines()) {
00176                         if (line.getName().equalsIgnoreCase("A2B2")) {
00177                                 assertEquals(a2, line.getSource());
00178                                 assertEquals(b2, line.getDestination());
00179                                 foundA2B2 = true;
00180                         } else if (line.getName().equalsIgnoreCase("P2B2")) {
00181                                 assertEquals(p2, line.getSource());
00182                                 assertEquals(b2, line.getDestination());                                
00183                                 foundP2B2 = true;
00184                         }
00185                 }
00186                 assertTrue( foundA2B2 );
00187                 assertTrue( foundP2B2 );
00188                 return parent;
00189         }
00190

00193         public System testPortNotFound(System parent) {
00194                 return parent;

00218         @Test
00219         @Given("#testPortNotFound(Simulink.System)")
00220         public System testAddSystemWithPList(System parent) {
00221                 PropertyList pList = new PropertyList("ale", parent, "alex");
00222                 SystemReference sysRef = simulinkEcoreCreator.addSystem( pList );
00223                 assertEquals(sysRef, simulinkEcoreCreator.findSystemReference(UUID.fromString(sysRef.getUuid())));
00224                 System sys = sysRef.getTarget();
00225                 assertTrue(sys.getName().equalsIgnoreCase("ale"));              
00226                 return parent;
00227         }
00228 
00229         @Test
00230         @Given("#testAddSystemWithPList(Simulink.System)")
00231         public System testFindInRepository(System parent) {
00232                 System sysA = simulinkEcoreCreator.findSystem("SysA");
00233                 UUID uuid = UUID.fromString( sysA.getUuid() );
00234                 assertEquals(simulinkEcoreCreator.findSystem(uuid), sysA);
00235                 Port port = sysA.getOutports().get(0);
00236                 uuid = UUID.fromString(port.getUuid());
00237                 assertEquals(simulinkEcoreCreator.findPort(uuid), port);
00238                 Line line = parent.getLines().get(0);
00239                 uuid = UUID.fromString(line.getUuid());
00240                 assertEquals(simulinkEcoreCreator.findLine(uuid), line);                
00241                 return parent;
00242         }
